Posts.Content: I am 58 years old. I had a biopsy today on my right breast. The surgeon told my family that the mass was the size of a pea and that was all he could tell them today. But for me to come to his office Monday at 2:30 for the results. YES I am worried !! With it being that small what are the chances of it being Malignant ?
Posts.Title: Breast biopsy
